# Akasec_Bootcamp : Cryptography Challenge üë®üèª‚Äçüíª
### function :
```
from Crypto.Util.number import *

flag = b'AKASEC{example_flag}'

p,q = getPrime(512),getPrime(512)
print(f"p = {p}")
print(f"q = {q}")
n = p*q
e = 65537
c = pow(bytes_to_long(flag), e, n)
print(f"c = {c}")
```

### output of function :
```
p = 6923137102002018896439892874311838963331048579236013080736897888999405868843546101316728554848351423854676121123159517311961076486413766019587386569502269
q = 9874008898098027497870992617392469559790053947372434497827266145109353866859468586812337563755872640653588663350660406259459878802545596481611448447352711
c = 

```

### solution : 
```
from Crypto.Util.number import *

p = 6923137102002018896439892874311838963331048579236013080736897888999405868843546101316728554848351423854676121123159517311961076486413766019587386569502269
q = 9874008898098027497870992617392469559790053947372434497827266145109353866859468586812337563755872640653588663350660406259459878802545596481611448447352711
c = 
e = 65537

n = p * q
phi = (p - 1) * (q - 1)
# Compute private key
d = pow(e, -1, phi)

# Decrypt the ciphertext
flag = long_to_bytes(pow(c, d, n))
print(f"Decrypted flag: {flag.decode()}")

```

## flag : AKASEC{simple_rsaf_bash_tfhmoha_mzn}
